page.title: 17MARKET GARDENING
page.content: fields is sandy,light and chalky and very good for this type of farming. Crops include brassica, potatoes, onions, carrots and lettuce. Last year the potato crop was not very good because of the dry weather. This year plastic sheeting was used to cover the crops to get them ready for the early markets. The grain is stored in silos but the market garden crops are sent straight to the markets. Mr Ballard says that farming is more a way of life then a job. He works five and a half days a week, ten hours a day all the year round except during the harvest when he works from dawn till dusk. He normally starts work at 7 am. but has to be up by 5.30 am. when lettuces have to be cut. In the future much more use will be made of plastic sheeting and field irrigation will be essential.
